scripts.dev: concurrently --names "TUNNEL,BACKEND,FRONTEND,INNGEST" -c "yellow,blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev:tunnel" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:inngest"
scripts.devNoPm2: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install-start: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run start:backend
scripts.start: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run start:backend
